experiences.title: Madrid Tapas After Dark
experiences.description: A guided evening tapas crawl through Madrid’s most iconic neighborhoods, discovering hidden local favorites.

experiences.title: From Market to Paella Masterclass
experiences.description: Shop fresh ingredients at a traditional market, then cook authentic Spanish paella with a local chef.

experiences.title: Vermouth & Traditions Tasting
experiences.description: A curated vermouth experience in historic taverns, learning the ritual behind Spain’s favorite aperitivo.

experiences.title: Flamenco Nights in the Old City
experiences.description: An intimate flamenco performance showcasing the passion, music, and rhythm of Spanish culture.

experiences.title: Prado Museum: Art Through the Ages
experiences.description: A guided journey through Spain’s most famous masterpieces at the Prado Museum.

experiences.title: Secrets of the Royal Palace
experiences.description: Explore Madrid’s Royal Palace and uncover stories of Spanish royalty and history.

experiences.title: Retiro Park Rowboats & Stroll
experiences.description: A relaxing boat ride on Retiro Park’s lake followed by a scenic walk through the park.

experiences.title: Bernabéu Legends Stadium Experience
experiences.description: A behind-the-scenes tour of Real Madrid’s legendary stadium and football history.

experiences.title: Madrid Rooftop Sunset Escape
experiences.description: Watch the sun set over Madrid from one of the city’s most beautiful rooftop viewpoints.
